features: Regular articulated fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy, with shaping at the elbows and shoulders for easy movement

Gore-Tex two-layer fabric with integrated stretchy materials for easy movement is windproof, waterproof, breathable, and durable: It's the versatile solution to staying warm and dry while moving outside; Gore-Tex fabric is Guaranteed to keep you dry™
PrimaLoft® Silver insulation [60g] repels moisture while trapping heat to keep you warm in nasty conditions
StormForm hood with drop construction and Cohaesive embedded cinch; Gore-Seam tape provides durable seam protection for a completely weather and waterproof design
Ergonomic water-repellent zip-out stretch waist gaiter with jacket-to-pant interface
Mesh-lined, no-snag Pit Zip vents; Two-way center front zipper; Ykk® water-resistant zippers
Shaped cuffs; Reflective logo detail; Zippered chest pocket, therma-pocket with media port, zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets and sleeve pass pocket, and power mesh dump pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
Gore-Tex 2-Layer Nylon 70D Plain Weave Fabric Blocked with Gore-Tex Stretch 2-Layer Nylon 70D Twill Weave Fabric
Living Lining® Mapped with Soft Taffeta, Closed Cell Mesh and Stretch Panels
